docs.snippet: Carlos Beltran did not win a pennant in his seven seasons with the Mets, but he says he has no need to redeem himself with the Yankees....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran did not win a pennant in his seven seasons with the Mets, but he says he has no need to redeem himself with the Yankees.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that outfielder Carlos Beltran has long wanted to join New York Yankees, but that he is not necessarily looking to redeem his failure to win a pennant during seven seasons with the New York Mets.

headline.main: Beltran Is Back in New York, With Nothing to Prove
headline.print_headline: Back in New York, and Nothing to Prove

docs.snippet: Kevin Youkilis, who spent a disappointing 2013 season with the Yankees, is joining the Rakuten Golden Eagles, Masahiro Tanaka’s team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis, who spent a disappointing 2013 season with the Yankees, is joining the Rakuten Golden Eagles, Masahiro Tanaka’s team.
docs.abstract: MLB roundup; former New York Yankees infielder Kevin Youkilis will join Japanese team the Rakuten Golden Eagles; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Youkilis Joins Star Pitcher’s Team in Japan
headline.print_headline: Youkilis Joins Star Pitcher’s Team in Japan
